gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 98, Kings 91
gameRecap.excerpt: Jalen Brunson led the Knicks with his second straight 40+ PT night with 42 points, five 3PM, and four rebounds as the Knicks defeated the Kings, 98-91. Domantas Sabonis extended his single season franchise-record double-double streak to 49 straight with 21 points and 14 rebounds as DeAaron Fox added 20 points, seven rebounds, and nine assists. The Knicks improve to 40-27 as the Kings move to 38-28.
